actor_awards.notes: A prolific character actor known for playing gangsters with a thick New York accent. He became a legendary television producer/director (The Dick Van Dyke Show, I Spy). The characters Sheldon and Leonard on 'The Big Bang Theory' were named in his honor.

filmography.title: It's a Wonderful Life
filmography.role_description: The friendly bartender at Martini's who becomes a surly, hard-bitten tavern owner in the alternate reality where George Bailey was never born.
filmography.plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

filmography.title: Guys and Dolls
filmography.role_description: A smooth-talking gambler and associate of Nathan Detroit in this musical adaptation.
filmography.plot: A gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy (Film)

filmography.title: To Have and Have Not
filmography.role_description: The corrupt Vichy police official in Martinique who harasses Humphrey Bogart's character.
filmography.plot: An American expatriate in Martinique is reluctant to get involved in the French Resistance until he falls for a young woman.

filmography.title: Pocketful of Miracles
filmography.role_description: A gangster involved in the scheme to transform Apple Annie into a society lady.
filmography.plot: A gangster helps an old apple-seller pose as a wealthy society matron to impress her daughter.

filmography.title: Another Thin Man
filmography.role_description: A gangster who threatens Nick Charles and becomes a suspect in a murder.
filmography.plot: Nick and Nora Charles return to New York with their new baby and Asta, where they become involved in a murder case at a Long Island estate.

filmography.title: The Brink's Job
filmography.role_description: Leonard portrays the famous FBI director in this crime comedy based on the Great Brink's Robbery.
filmography.plot: A group of small-time crooks pull off a legendary heist at the Brink's office in Boston.

filmography.title: Decoy
filmography.role_description: A hard-boiled police detective investigating a ruthless femme fatale.
filmography.plot: A tough police sergeant trails a woman who uses men to get what she wants, including a fortune in stolen money.

filmography.title: Tortilla Flat
filmography.role_description: A character in the adaptation of John Steinbeck's novel about paisanos in Monterey.
filmography.plot: The adventures of a group of camaraderie-loving paisanos in Monterey, California.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor (Frank Morgan)

filmography.title: Abbott and Costello Meet the Invisible Man
filmography.role_description: A crooked fight promoter who frames a boxer for murder.
filmography.plot: Two bumbling private eyes help a boxer who has been framed for murder and has turned invisible to clear his name.

filmography.title: Somewhere in the Night
filmography.role_description: A shady character in this film noir about an amnesiac searching for his identity.
filmography.plot: An amnesiac war veteran prowls the Los Angeles underworld in search of his identity and a missing fortune.

filmography.title: Money from Home
filmography.role_description: A gangster who threatens a veterinarian in this Martin and Lewis 3D comedy.
filmography.plot: A gambler and his cousin get mixed up with gangsters and a fix on a horse race.

filmography.title: Sinbad the Sailor
filmography.role_description: A minor but memorable role in this Technicolor adventure film starring Douglas Fairbanks Jr.
filmography.plot: Sinbad embarks on his eighth voyage to find the lost treasure of Alexander the Great.

filmography.title: Captain Kidd
filmography.role_description: A treacherous pirate serving under the notorious Captain Kidd.
filmography.plot: Captain Kidd, a ruthless pirate, tricks the King into commissioning him to escort a treasure ship, planning to steal it for himself.

filmography.title: Tall, Dark and Handsome
filmography.role_description: A gangster henchman in this crime comedy.
filmography.plot: A soft-hearted gangster creates a fake family to impress a woman.

filmography.title: Lucky Jordan
filmography.role_description: A gangster rival to the protagonist who gets drafted into the army.
filmography.plot: A gangster tries to dodge the draft but ends up fighting Nazi spies.

filmography.title: Street of Chance
filmography.role_description: A detective investigating a murder involving an amnesiac.
filmography.plot: A man wakes up with amnesia to find he is suspected of murder and must clear his name.

filmography.title: Zombies on Broadway
filmography.role_description: A gangster who demands a real zombie for his nightclub opening.
filmography.plot: Two press agents travel to a Caribbean island to find a real zombie for a nightclub opening.

filmography.title: The Gangster
filmography.role_description: A rival mobster threatening the territory of the protagonist.
filmography.plot: A paranoid gangster's hold on his territory slips as a rival moves in and his girlfriend loses interest.

filmography.title: My Dream Is Yours
filmography.role_description: A talent agent in this musical comedy starring Doris Day.
filmography.plot: A talent scout discovers a young mother with a beautiful voice and tries to make her a star.

filmography.title: Come Fill the Cup
filmography.role_description: A gangster involved with the newspaper editor protagonist.
filmography.plot: A recovering alcoholic reporter tries to help a young man who has fallen into the same trap.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor (Gig Young)

filmography.title: Stop, You're Killing Me
filmography.role_description: A gangster in this remake of 'A Slight Case of Murder'.
filmography.plot: A beer baron tries to go legit after the repeal of Prohibition but faces challenges from his past associates.

filmography.title: Here Come the Nelsons
filmography.role_description: A gangster who gets involved with the Nelson family in their feature film debut.
filmography.plot: Ozzie and Harriet Nelson get mixed up with gangsters while trying to organize the town's centennial celebration.

filmography.title: Take One False Step
filmography.role_description: A detective investigating a murder involving a college professor.
filmography.plot: A professor gets involved in a murder investigation when an old flame asks him for help.

filmography.title: If You Knew Susie
filmography.role_description: A gangster character in this musical comedy starring Eddie Cantor.
filmography.plot: A vaudeville couple retires to their ancestral home and discovers a hidden fortune.

filmography.title: The Falcon in Hollywood
filmography.role_description: A gangster the Falcon encounters while investigating a murder at a movie studio.
filmography.plot: The Falcon investigates a murder on a movie set while on vacation in Hollywood.
